channel.title: Need help on making my new server
channel.description:
Hello i created a server today,but i found out it is harder with a router.i have created a server before when i did not have my router.i just got one recently for my mums laptop.
So i was looking for someone helping making it and i can create a costum client and i will code it.and i will make you admin and me,there will be costum admin crowns.when it is made.
i have made a ip allready i am calling it enchant.
the ip is : Enchant.no-ip.info
if nobody wants to take the job can they atleast help me with the router
the router is called SMC i dont know how to use that one but i would rather someone make the client and i coded and made costum client. i can get helblore working
so if your interested i can teach you how to make a client and were to put the codes.but i cant because my router please help.

Have u tried opening the port on your Computers firewall?

item.title: Need help on making my new server
item.dc:creator: @Hypnoticweener Hypnoticweener
item.description:
@Hypnoticweener wrote:

Not sure on ur router,but i think it should be something similar
Go to your Router>Firewall>Settings>Select computer>
Then click on DMZ> done

THen u have to restart ur computer.

Read full topic
